articles.title: Kevin Costner's Yellowstone breaks records as 9.3 MILLION tune in to watch the season 4 finale - Daily Mail
articles.description: Yellowstone set new rating records with its Season 4 finale on Sunday, bringing in 11 million collective viewers on premiere night, becoming and most-watched telecast in the last five years.
